description: Show AFNI updates per user, dates, or levels.

check_date.title: Check Date
check_date.description: Check history against given date. If most recent afni_history is older than the passed date, the distribution version might be considered out of date.

list_authors.title: List Authors Flag
list_authors.description: Show the list of valid authors

list_types.title: List Types Flag
list_types.description: Show the list of valid change types

author.title: Author
author.description: Restrict output to the given author

level.title: Level
level.description: Restrict output to the given level

min_level.title: Minimum Level
min_level.description: Restrict output to at least level LEVEL

program.title: Program
program.description: Restrict output to the given program

past_entries.title: Past Entries
past_entries.description: Restrict output to final ENTRIES entries

past_days.title: Past Days
past_days.description: Restrict output to the past DAYS days

past_months.title: Past Months
past_months.description: Restrict output to the past MONTHS months

past_years.title: Past Years
past_years.description: Restrict output to the past YEARS years

type.title: Type
type.description: Restrict output to the given TYPE (TYPE = 0..5, or strings 'NEW_PROG', etc.)

dline.title: Divider Line Flag
dline.description: Put a divider line between dates

reverse.title: Reverse Sorting Order Flag
reverse.description: Reverse the sorting order (sort is by date, author, level, program)

show_field.title: Show Field
show_field.description: Restrict entry output to field FIELD. Valid FIELDs include: all, firstline, day, month, year, date, author, program, level, type, desc, verbtext.
